      • setUseShutdownNow

        public ModularBotBuilder setUseShutdownNow(boolean useShutdownNow)
        If set to true the ModularBot.shutdown() method will use JDA.shutdownNow(). (default) false.
        Parameters:
        useShutdownNow - Whether or not to force the shutdown of the shards.
        See Also:
        DefaultShardManagerBuilder.setUseShutdownNow(boolean)
